dmca.title: [ABUSE] Theft of copyrighted materials
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital
Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim.

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/legal.
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC. 

-----Original Message-----
From: Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Tuesday, November 29, 2005 8:00 AM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Cc: Policy Enforcement
Subject: Fwd: [ABUSE] Theft of copyrighted materials


For your review.

Martin Gaston
Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/

Begin forwarded message:

> From: "Joel Comm" <joel@worldvillage.com>
> Date: November 28, 2005 8:44:59 PM CST
> To: <abuse@theplanet.com>
> Subject: [ABUSE] Theft of copyrighted materials
> Reply-To: joel@worldvillage.com
>
> To whom it may concern at ThePlanet.com,
>
> It has come to my attention that my copyrighted material is being 
> illegally resold on a web site belonging to Nguyen Phuc kien. The 
> domain in reference is:
> http://allmakemoney.info/google.htm
>
> My traceroute shows that this site is being hosted at theplanet.com
>
> This theft is a federal crime and is subject to prosecution under the 
> full extent of United States and International copyright law.
> The perptrator may be subject to fines and jail time if convicted.
>
> Under the Digital Millenium Copyright Act (DMCA), I ask that this page 
> be removed from the Internet and all illegal sales of my
> material cease immediately.   I know that ThePlanet.com is not the  
> guilty party and I hope you will enforce discipline on this illegal 
> behavior.
>
> Joel Comm
>
> Author
>
> "What Google Never Told You About Making Money with AdSense"
>
> www.adsense-secrets.com
>
>
